Beast Bond (D1 Divi): Touched friendly beast with Intelligence up to 3 gains a telepathic link with self and advantage on attacks on foes adjacent to self for concentration up to 10 min
Bones Of The Earth (D6 Tran): R120' Creates 6 5'x30' pillars that inflict 6d6 HP bludgeoning and pin creatures caught between the top of a pillar and the ceiling (save Dexterity negates; Dexterity or Strength frees) [+Level creates +2 pillars]
Catapult (W1 Tran): R60' Hurls a 5 lb target object 90', inflicting 3d8 HP bludgeoning (save Dexterity negates) [+Level hurls +5 lb, inflicting +1d8 HP]

Control Flames (D0 Tran): R60' Target flame up to a 5' cube expands 5', snuffs, doubles light area for 1 hr, or forms shapes for 1 hr
Control Winds (D5 Tran): R300' Air in a 100' cube creates gusts (can inflict disadvantage on ranged attacks and half movement), a downdraft (inflicts disadvantage on ranged attacks and knocks prone flying creatures (save Strength negates)), or an updraft (reduces damage from falling by half and gives +10' jumps) for concentration up to 1 hr
Create Bonfire (D0 Conj): R60' Creates a 5' fire that inflicts 4d8 HP fire (save Dexterity negates) and ignites flammable objects for concentration up to 1 min
Create Homunculus (W6 Tran): 1 hr process inflicts 2d4 HP piercing on self to create a magical companion

Dragon's Breath (S2 Tran): Touched can exhale a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison, inflicting 3d6 HP (save Dexterity half) in a 15' cone for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Druid Grove (D6 Abju): Touched 90' cube responds to intruders with chosen hostile effects for 24 hr

Earthbind (D2 Tran): R300' Reduces the target's fly Speed to 0 for concentration up to 1 min (save Strength negates)

Enervation (K5 Necr): R60' Target suffers 4d6 HP necrotic each rd, and self regains half the amount inflicted, for concentration up to 1 min (save Dexterity suffers 2d6 HP once only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]

Far Step (K5 Conj): Allows self to teleport 60' each rd for concentration up to 1 min

Guardian Of Nature (D4 Tran): Changes self into a Primal Beast with +10 Speed, 120' Darkvision, advantage on Strength, and +1d6 HP force from melee weapons, or into a Great Tree with 10 temporary hit points, advantage on Constitution, advantage on Dexterity and Wisdom attacks, and a 15' radius that inflicts difficult terrain on foes, for concentration up to 1 min
Gust (D0 Tran): R30' Pushes the target creature 5' (save Strength negates), pushes an unattended 5 lb object 10', or creates a light breeze
Healing Spirit (D2 Conj): R60' Allies in a 5' cube regain 1d6 HP each rd for concentration up to 1 min, to a maximum of 3 healings [+Level heals +1d6 HP]
Holy Weapon (C5 Evoc): Touched weapon lights 30' and inflicts +2d8 HP radiant for concentration up to 1 hr; dismissal inflicts 4d8 HP radiant and blindness for 1 min (save Constitution half HP only; an additional save each rd ends blindness) on targets in a 30' radius

Immolation (S5 Evoc): R90' Inflicts 8d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half), then 4d6 HP fire each rd (save Dexterity ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Infernal Calling (K5 Conj): R90' Summons a CR 6 devil, obedient only with a successful Charisma vs. Insight check (knowing its true name gives advantage, and possessing its talisman makes the check unnecessary), for concentration up to 1 hr or until it is reduced to 0 hit points [+Level summons +1 CR]
Infestation (D0 Conj): R30' Target suffers 4d6 HP poison and moves 5' in a random direction (save Constitution negates)
Investiture Of Flame (D6 Tran): Self lights 30', gains immunity to fire and advantage on saves vs. cold, inflicts 1d10 HP fire in a 5' radius, and can inflict 4d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) in a 15'x5' line for concentration up to 10 min
Investiture Of Ice (D6 Tran): Self gains immunity to cold and advantage on saves vs. fire, moves normally across ice and snow, inflicts difficult terrain in a 10' radius, and can inflict 4d6 HP cold and half speed for 1 rd (save Dexterity half HP only) in a 15' cone for concentration up to 10 min
Investiture Of Stone (D6 Tran): Self gains resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing, can inflict knocked prone (save Dexterity negates) in a 15' radius, moves normally across earth and stone difficult terrain, and can pass through earth and stone for concentration up to 10 min
Investiture Of Wind (D6 Tran): Inflicts disadvantage on ranged attacks on self, gives self a 60' fly Speed, and allows inflicting 2d10 HP bludgeoning, plus a 10' push on Large or smaller creatures, in a R60' 15' cube for concentration up to 10 min

Primal Savagery (D0 Tran): Melee spell attack inflicts 4d10 HP acid
Primordial Ward (D6 Abju): Self gains resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder for concentration up to 1 min and can dismiss as a reaction upon taking damage to gain immunity for 1 rd
Psychic Scream (B9 Ench): R90' 10 targets with Intelligence 3 or higher suffer 14d6 HP psychic (save Intelligence half) and stunned (save Intelligence each rd ends)

Scatter (K6 Conj): R30' Teleports 5 targets 120' (save Wisdom negates)
Shadow Blade (K2 Illu): Creates a shadow sword that gives advantage on attacks in dim light, inflicts 2d8 HP psychic, and has the finesse, light and thrown properties with a range of 20/60, for concentration up to 1 min [+Level increases damage to 3d8, 4d8, or 5d8 HP at level 3, 5, or 7]
Shadow Of Moil (K4 Necr): 10' radius dims light, gives self resistance to radiant damage, and inflicts 2d8 HP necrotic on a successful attacker for concentration up to 1 min
Shape Water (D0 Tran): R30' 5' cube of water forms animated shapes, changes color or opacity, or freezes for 1 hr or changes flow 5'

Skywrite (B2 Tran): Clouds form 10 words for concentration up to 1 hr

Storm Sphere (S4 Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning (save Strength negates) and can emit a 60' bolt that inflicts 4d6 HP lightning once per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Summon Greater Demon (K4 Conj): R60' Demon up to CR 5 obeys commands (save Charisma ends; speaking the true name inflicts disadvantage) or attacks the nearest creature for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level summons +1 CR]
Summon Lesser Demons (K3 Conj): R60' 2 CR 1, 4 CR 1/2, or 6 CR 1/4 demons each attack the nearest creature for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level doubles or triples the demon count at level 6 or 8]
Synaptic Static (B5 Ench): R120' Creatures with Intelligence 3 or higher in a 20' radius suffer 8d6 HP psychic and -1d6 attack, ability, and concentration Constitution for 1 min (save Intelligence half HP only; an additional save each rd ends the penalty)
Temple Of The Gods (C7 Conj): R120' Creates a 120' sq temple that bars divination, ethereal travel, and choices of celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead (save Charisma instead inflicts -1d4 attack, ability, and saves) and gives a +2 bonus to healing for 1 dy; casting every day for a year makes it permanent
Tenser's Transformation (W6 Tran): Self gains 50 temporary hit points, advantage on simple and martial weapon attacks, +2d12 HP force weapon damage, Armor Proficiency (Light; Heavy; Shield), Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons), Save Proficiency (Constitution; Strength), and an extra attack for concentration up to 10 min; inflicts 1 level of exhaustion afterward (save DC 15 Constitution negates)
Thunder Step (K3 Conj): Self and 1 willing adjacent creature teleport 90', and a 10' radius around the starting location inflicts 3d10 HP thunder (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Thunderclap (B0 Evoc): 5' radius inflicts 4d6 HP thunder
Tidal Wave (D3 Conj): R120' 30'x10' area inflicts 4d8 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save Dexterity half HP only) and extinguishes flames within 30'
Tiny Servant (W3 Tran): Touched Tiny object sprouts arms and legs and obeys commands for 8 hr [+Level animates +2 objects]
Toll The Dead (C0 Necr): R60' Target suffers 4d8 HP necrotic, or 4d12 HP necrotic if previously damaged (save Wisdom negates)
Transmute Rock (D5 Tran): R120' 40' cube changes between rock and mud
Vitriolic Sphere (S4 Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 10d4 HP acid, then 5d4 HP acid next rd (save Dexterity half initial HP only) [+Level inflicts +2d4 HP initial]
Wall Of Light (K5 Evoc): R120' 60'x10' wall lights 120', inflicts 4d8 HP radiant, and blinds (save Constitution half HP only; additional saves end blindness) for concentration up to 10 min; can emit a 60' ray each rd that inflicts 4d8 HP radiant and shortens the wall by 10' [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Sand (W3 Evoc): R90' 30'x10' wall inflicts 1/3 Speed and blocks vision for concentration up to 10 min
Wall Of Water (D3 Evoc): R60' 30'x10' wall or 20'x20' ring inflicts disadvantage on ranged attacks, reduces fire effects by half, and turns to ice from cold effects for concentration up to 10 min
Warding Wind (B2 Evoc): 10' radius deafens others, extinguishes flames, bars gas and fog, inflicts difficult terrain, and inflicts disadvantage on ranged attacks for concentration up to 10 min
Watery Sphere (D4 Conj): R90' 5' sphere traps 1 Large or 4 Medium targets (save Strength ends) and can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Whirlwind (D7 Evoc): R300' 10' radius inflicts 10d6 HP bludgeoning (save Dexterity half), restrains and pulls 5' upward (save Strength or Dexterity negates; additional saves eject the creature 3d6 x 10'), and can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Word Of Radiance (C0 Evoc): R5' Targets suffer 4d6 HP radiant (save Constitution negates)
Wrath Of Nature (D5 Evoc): R120' Animates a 60' cube of nature to attack targets for concentration up to 1 min: trees inflict 4d6 HP slashing (save Dexterity negates) in a 10' radius; undergrowth inflicts difficult terrain, vines restrain 1 target each rd (save Strength negates; additional saves end), and a ranged spell attack as a bonus action each rd causes rocks to inflict 3d8 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save Dexterity HP only)
Zephyr Strike (R1 Tran): Self movement does not provoke opportunity attacks for concentration up to 1 min; can attack with advantage once during the spell, inflicting +1d8 HP force and gaining +30 Speed for 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Acolyte Of Nature: Knows 1 druid cantrip
Eldritch Invocations: 2 selections
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 wizard cantrips and can cast a chosen W1 spell once per long rest
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 1 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest once per long rest
Bardic Inspiration: R60' Can use a bonus action to give an ally a +1d6 bonus on an ability, attack, or saving throw within 10 min once per long rest
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect 2 times per short rest
Charm Animals And Plants: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to charm beasts and plants (save Wisdom negates) for 1 min
Conjuration Savant: Can copy conjuration spells into spellbook for half cost
Font Of Magic: Can use 2 Sorcery Points per long rest and can use a bonus action to convert between Sorcery Points and spell slots
Grasp Of Hadar: Eldritch Blast can pull the target 10' once per rd
Lay On Hands: Can heal 20 hit points per long rest and can use 5 hit points' worth to cure disease or poison
Minor Conjuration: R10' Can create a 3' cube inanimate object weighing up to 10 lb that emits 5' dim light and lasts for 1 hr or until it takes or deals damage
Nature's Wrath: R10' Can use Channel Divinity to create spectral vines that restrain a target (save DC 11 Dexterity or Strength negates)
Pact Magic: Can cast spells from the warlock spell list
Song Of Rest: Friendly listeners regain +1d6 hit points from spending Hit Dice after a short rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Spirit Totem (Bear): R60' Can use a bonus action to give targets in a 30' radius 7 temporary hit points and advantage on Strength for 1 min once per short rest
Spirit Totem (Hawk): R60' Can use a bonus action to give targets in a 30' radius advantage on Perception, and can use a reaction to give advantage on an attack, for 1 min once per short rest
Spirit Totem (Unicorn): R60' Can use a bonus action to give allies advantage to detect creatures in a 30' radius, and self heal spells also restore 2 hit points to targets in the same radius, for 1 min once per short rest
Wild Shape: Can transform into a CR 1/4 (land only) creature for 1 hr 2 times per short rest
Notes
Validation Errors:
Multiclass Requirements: Requires meeting the multiclass requirements for 3 additional chosen classes
Skill Proficiency Allocation: 19 available vs. 18 allocated
